titleStmt.title: Caroloiades, or, The rebellion of forty one in ten books : a heroick poem.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Edward, fl. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. B. for the author and publish'd by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Edward Howard. Cf. BM.

This work published anonymously in 1689. Reissued with a dedicatory epistle by the author and a new title page under the title Caroloiades redivivus, or, The war and revolutions in the time of King Charles the First. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
